itemLabel: Kenneth Baker, Baron Baker of Dorking

wikipedia_page.main: Kenneth Wilfred Baker, Baron Baker of Dorking,  (born 3 November 1934) is a British politician, a former Conservative Member of Parliament and cabinet minister, including holding the offices of Home Secretary, Education Secretary and Conservative Party Chairman. He is a life member of the Tory Reform Group.

response: *1934 – Kenneth Baker, Baron Baker of Dorking, English poet and politician, Chancellor of the Duchy of Lancaster
